                   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   /   /   f   l   s   -   e   u   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   .   u   k   /   1   /   b   a   t   c   h   /   1   /   O   P   /   A   1   F   8   3   G   8   C   2   A   R   O   7   P   :   2   7   5   -   0   2   2   6   8   1   2   -   6   0   9   6   0   7   2   :   0   H   V   9   6   E   G   M   B   0   K   4   J   F   9   H   J   T   6   P   $   u   e   d   a   t   a   =   s   :   %   2   F   d   p   %   2   F   0   3   0   6   8   0   4   3   7   9   %   2   F   u   e   d   a   t   a   %   2   F   u   n   s   t   i   c   k   y   %   2   F   2   7   5   -   0   2   2   6   8   1   2   -   6   0   9   6   0   7   2   %   2   F   D   e   t   a   i   l   %   2   F   n   t   p   o   f   f   r   w   %   3   F   s   t   a   t   i   c   b   %   2   6   i   d   %   3   D   0   H   V   9   6   E   G   M   B   0   K   4   J   F   9   H   J   T   6   P   %   2   6   p   t   y   %   3   D   D   e   t   a   i   l   A   W   %   2   6   s   p   t   y   %   3   D   g   l   a   n   c   e   %   2   6   p   t   i   %   3   D   0   9   5   7   1   5   5   8   1   6   :   1   0   0   0   '       /   &gt;

                           a       i   d   =   "   s   w   f   I   m   a   g   e   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       e   m   a   i   l   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       v   i   a       e   -   m   a   i   l   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   p   d   p   /   t   a   f   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   l   _   v   i   e   w   _   d   p   _   v   y   x   P   v   b   0   V   6   G   B   K   J   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;       c   l   a   s   s   =   \   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   a   -   r   o   w   \   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   &amp;g   t   ;   \   n           &amp;l   t   ;   d   i   v       c   l   a   s   s   =   \   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;        	   d   i   v   &gt;       W   a   g   n   e   r   '   s       R   i   n   g       c   y   c   l   e       -       "   T   h   e       R   i   n   g       o   f       t   h   e       N   i   e   b   e   l   u   n   g   "       -       h   a   s       b   e   e   n       d   e   s   c   r   i   b   e   d       a   s       o   n   e       o   f       t   h   e       m   o   s   t       e   n   d   u   r   i   n   g       o   f       o   p   e   r   a   t   i   c       s   p   e   c   t   a   c   l   e   s   .                    }   
                   i   f       (   r   e   s   u   l   t   .   s   t   a   t   u   s       =   =       "   c   s   r   f   -   a   t   t   a   c   k   "   )       {

D   A   s   f   .   l   o   a   d   A   d   s   (   )   ;   }       e   l   s   e       {   v   a   r       s   f   L   i   b   r   a   r   y       =       d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   c   r   e   a   t   e   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   (   '   s   c   r   i   p   t   '   )   ;   s   f   L   i   b   r   a   r   y   .   t   y   p   e       =       "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   ;   s   f   L   i   b   r   a   r   y   .   a   s   y   n   c       =       t   r   u   e   ;   s   f   L   i   b   r   a   r   y   .   c   h   a   r   s   e   t       =       "   u   t   f   -   8   "   ;   s   f   L   i   b   r   a   r   y   .   s   r   c       =       "   h   t   t   p   s   :   /   /   d   e   w   9   c   k   z   j   y   t   2   g   n   .   c   l   o   u   d   f   r   o   n   t   .   n   e   t   /   s   f   /   D   A   s   f   -   1   .   2   3   .   j   s   "   ;   (   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   g   e   t   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   B   y   T   a   g   N   a   m   e   (   '   h   e   a   d   '   )   [   0   ]   |   |   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   g   e   t   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   B   y   T   a   g   N   a   m   e   (   '   b   o   d   y   '   )   [   0   ]   )   .   a   p   p   e   n   d   C   h   i   l   d   (   s   f   L   i   b   r   a   r   y   )   ;   }   }       c   a   t   c   h   (   e   x   )       {   i   f   (   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   u   e   L   o   g   E   r   r   o   r   )       {   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   u   e   L   o   g   E   r   r   o   r   (   e   x   ,       {   l   o   g   L   e   v   e   l       :       '   E   R   R   O   R   '   ,   a   t   t   r   i   b   u   t   i   o   n       :       '   D   A   C   X   -   s   a   f   e   f   r   a   m   e   '   ,   m   e   s   s   a   g   e       :       '   E   r   r   o   r       a   p   p   e   n   d   i   n   g       D   A   s   f       l   i   b   r   a   r   y   '   }   )   ;   }   }   ;   }   (   w   i   n   d   o   w   ,       d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   )   )   ;   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   
                           /   d   i   v   &gt;
